alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 6:09PM CST until December 31 at 12:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Freezing drizzle causing travel impacts this evening... .Dozens of accidents are being reported across southeast Minnesota and western Wisconsin as a result of freezing drizzle this evening. Road conditions will deteriorate through the evening and may remain slick through the overnight if untreated. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle, mixed at times with snow. A glaze of ice is expected with total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Northeast Iowa, southeast Minnesota and southwest into west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Road conditions may change very suddenly over short distances.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Minnesota, visit 511mn.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
